EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2017-10-05
EmailTemplate.subject: Season Finale of That Moment and Oracle Joining the Cloud Foundry Party
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
OCTOBER 05, 2017 <[[https://builttoadapt.io/that-moment-episode-6-fail-fail-again-fail-better-2f612db57415?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> “Fail, fail again, fail better” In the season finale of “That Moment,” Impossible founder Lily Cole discusses her journey from renowned model to digital entrepreneur with host Michael Copeland. Next, stand-up comedian and Talk Show the Game Show host Guy Branum, who risked everything when he left behind a legal career to pursue his calling, shares why he didn’t waver when times got tough. Listen and Subscribe <[[https://builttoadapt.io/that-moment-episode-6-fail-fail-again-fail-better-2f612db57415?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/on-choice-and-oracle-joining-the-cloud-foundry-party?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> On Choice and Oracle Joining the Cloud Foundry Party Dormain Drewitz reviews the three major integrations available now or coming soon with the arrival of Cloud Foundry on Oracle Cloud. Expand your PCF Choices <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/on-choice-and-oracle-joining-the-cloud-foundry-party?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/frequent-iteration-is-the-antidote-to-monolithic-big-bet-software-projects-a6aec481b284?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Frequent Iteration is the Antidote to Monolithic, Big Bet Software Projects Learn how West Corp.—the company that powers 70% of all 911 calls in the US—adopted a modern approach to their business. Learn More <[[https://builttoadapt.io/frequent-iteration-is-the-antidote-to-monolithic-big-bet-software-projects-a6aec481b284?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-banner&utm_campaign=s1p-registration]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/pks-brings-production-grade-kubernetes-to-the-enterprise-ep-45?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> PKS Brings Production-Grade Kubernetes to the Enterprise (Ep. 45) This week on Pivotal Insights, Pivotal's John Allwright joins Dormain and Jeff to introduce Pivotal Container Service (PKS), a new offering that eases the Day 2 operations burden for container orchestration and provides access to infrastructure primitives. John, Dormain, and Jeff also talk about the relationship between PKS and Pivotal Cloud Foundry, and the role VMware and Google played in developing PKS. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/pks-brings-production-grade-kubernetes-to-the-enterprise-ep-45?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/how-pcf-metrics-helps-you-reduce-mttr-for-spring-boot-apps-and-save-money-too?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> How PCF Metrics Helps You Reduce MTTR for Spring Boot Apps (and Save Money too) Product Manager Judy Wang explains the new features of PCF Metrics 1.4. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/how-pcf-metrics-helps-you-reduce-mttr-for-spring-boot-apps-and-save-money-too?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://builttoadapt.io/a-motivating-and-refreshing-approach-to-software-7e6b57cd1d69?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> A Motivating and Refreshing Approach to Software This week for Pivotal Voices, we’re featuring Ichizo Umehara, Developer at Pivotal Tokyo. Read Now <[[https://builttoadapt.io/a-motivating-and-refreshing-approach-to-software-7e6b57cd1d69?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/case-studies/dell-technologies-improving-operations-and-developer-productivity-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry?_lrsc=d918de7e-0c10-4745-b527-e13c87bd89c8&utm_source=employee-social&utm_medium=twitter&utm_campaign=employee_advocacy?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Dell Technologies: Improving Operations and Developer Productivity with Pivotal Cloud Foundry Learn how Dell Technologies utilized Pivotal Cloud Foundry to improve their operations and developer productivity. Read the Case Study <[[https://content.pivotal.io/case-studies/dell-technologies-improving-operations-and-developer-productivity-with-pivotal-cloud-foundry?_lrsc=d918de7e-0c10-4745-b527-e13c87bd89c8&utm_source=employee-social&utm_medium=twitter&utm_campaign=employee_advocacy?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 10/11-10/12 Cloud Foundry Summit Europe, Basel <[[https://www.cloudfoundry.org/event/europe-2017/]]>
10/12 SpringOne Platform Preview, Toronto <[[https://toronto-springone-preview.cfapps.io/]]>
10/12 Toronto SpringOne Preview 2017, Toronto <[[https://www.meetup.com/Toronto-Pivotal-User-Group/events/243155539/]]>
10/24 Analytics Innovation Roadshow, San Francisco <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/san-francisco?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
10/29-10/30 Cloud-Native Architecture Fundamentals, New York <[[https://conferences.oreilly.com/software-architecture/sa-training-ny/public/schedule/detail/63240]]>
